193  struct SliderJointComponent {
194 
195  bool isLimitEnabled;
196  bool isMotorEnabled;
197  decimal lowerLimit;
198  decimal upperLimit;
199  decimal motorSpeed;
200  decimal maxMotorForce;
201 
203  SliderJointComponent(bool isLimitEnabled, bool isMotorEnabled, decimal lowerLimit, decimal upperLimit,
204  decimal motorSpeed, decimal maxMotorForce)
205  :isLimitEnabled(isLimitEnabled), isMotorEnabled(isMotorEnabled), lowerLimit(lowerLimit), upperLimit(upperLimit),
206  motorSpeed(motorSpeed), maxMotorForce(maxMotorForce) {
207 
208  }
209  };
210

456  // -------------------- Friendship -------------------- //

460  friend class SliderJoint;
461 };
462 
463 // Return a pointer to a given joint
464 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE SliderJoint* SliderJointComponents::getJoint(Entity jointEntity) const {
465 
466  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
467  return mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
468 }
469 
470 // Set the joint pointer to a given joint
471 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void SliderJointComponents::setJoint(Entity jointEntity, SliderJoint* joint) const {
472 
473  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
474  mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = joint;
475 }
476 
477 // Return the local anchor point of body 1 for a given joint
478 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& SliderJointComponents::getLocalAnchorPointBody1(Entity jointEntity) const {
479 
480  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
481  return mLocalAnchorPointBody1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
482 }
483 
484 // Set the local anchor point of body 1 for a given joint
485 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void SliderJointComponents::setLocalAnchorPointBody1(Entity jointEntity, const Vector3& localAnchoirPointBody1) {
486 
487  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
488  mLocalAnchorPointBody1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = localAnchoirPointBody1;
489 }
490 
491 // Return the local anchor point of body 2 for a given joint
492 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& SliderJointComponents::getLocalAnchorPointBody2(Entity jointEntity) const {
493 
494  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
495  return mLocalAnchorPointBody2[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
496 }
497 
498 // Set the local anchor point of body 2 for a given joint
499 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void SliderJointComponents::setLocalAnchorPointBody2(Entity jointEntity, const Vector3& localAnchoirPointBody2) {
500 
501  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
502  mLocalAnchorPointBody2[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = localAnchoirPointBody2;
503 }
504 
505 // Return the inertia tensor of body 1 (in world-space coordinates)
506 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Matrix3x3& SliderJointComponents::getI1(Entity jointEntity) const {
507 
508  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
509  return mI1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
510 }
511 
512 // Set the inertia tensor of body 1 (in world-space coordinates)
513 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void SliderJointComponents::setI1(Entity jointEntity, const Matrix3x3& i1) {
514 
515  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
516  mI1[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = i1;
517 }
518 
519 // Return the inertia tensor of body 2 (in world-space coordinates)
520 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Matrix3x3& SliderJointComponents::getI2(Entity jointEntity) const {
521 
522  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
523  return mI2[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
524 }
525 
526 // Set the inertia tensor of body 2 (in world-space coordinates)
527 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void SliderJointComponents::setI2(Entity jointEntity, const Matrix3x3& i2) {
528 
529  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
530  mI2[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = i2;
531 }

537  return mImpulseTranslation[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
538 }

561 // Return the translation inverse mass matrix of the constraint
562 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Matrix2x2& SliderJointComponents::getInverseMassMatrixTranslation(Entity jointEntity) {
563 
564  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
565  return mInverseMassMatrixTranslation[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
566 }
567

570 
571  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
572  mInverseMassMatrixTranslation[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = inverseMassMatrix;
573 }

719  return mImpulseLowerLimit[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
720 }

756  mImpulseMotor[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = impulseMotor;
757 }
758 
759 // Return the inverse of mass matrix K=JM^-1J^t for the limits (1x1 matrix)
760 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal SliderJointComponents::getInverseMassMatrixLimit(Entity jointEntity) const {
761 
762  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
763  return mInverseMassMatrixLimit[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
764 }
765 
766 // Set the inverse of mass matrix K=JM^-1J^t for the limits (1x1 matrix)
767 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void SliderJointComponents::setInverseMassMatrixLimit(Entity jointEntity, decimal inverseMassMatrixLimitMotor) {
768 
769  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
770  mInverseMassMatrixLimit[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]] = inverseMassMatrixLimitMotor;
771 }
772 
773 // Return the inverse of mass matrix K=JM^-1J^t for the motor
774 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal SliderJointComponents::getInverseMassMatrixMotor(Entity jointEntity) {
775 
776  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(jointEntity));
777  return mInverseMassMatrixMotor[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[jointEntity]];
778 }
